sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; class DataDisplay extends Component { render() { const { currentData } = this.props; const { flightData } = currentData; if (!flightData) { return (
No Flight Data received
); } return (
Latitude {`${Math.round(flightData.latitude*100000)/100000}ยบ`}
Longitude {`${Math.round(flightData.longitude*100000)/100000}ยบ`}
Relative Direction {`${Math.round(flightData.direction * 100000) / 100000}ยบ`}
Altitude GPS (ft) {Math.round(flightData.altitude*100)/100}
Velocity (m/s) {Math.round(flightData.velocity*100)/100}
Headwind (m/s) {Math.round(flightData.headwind*100)/100}
TimeElapsed {currentData.timeElapsed}
Payload Prediction (ft) {Math.round(flightData.payloadPredictionDistance * 1000) / 1000 }
CDA Prediction(ft) {Math.round(flightData.CDAPredictionDistance * 1000) / 1000}
); } } export default DataDisplay;
